{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Tiny volcano blast | class = VolcanoTBlast | game = Heretic | spawnid = 124 | spawnname = T_TINYVOLCANOBALL }}[[Classes]]: VolcanoTBlast
A tiny ball of fire, resulting from the explosion of a [[Classes:VolcanoBlast|bigger one]] spitted by a [[Classes:Volcano|volcano]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR VolcanoTBlast { {{Property|Radius}} 8 {{Property|Height}} 6 {{Property|Speed}} 2 {{Property|Damage}} 1 {{Property|DamageType}} Fire {{Property|Gravity}} 0.125 +{{Flag|NOBLOCKMAP}} +{{Flag|MISSILE}} +{{Flag|DROPOFF}} +{{Flag|NOTELEPORT}} States { Spawn: VTFB AB 4 Bright Loop Death: SFFI CBABCDE 4 Bright Stop } }
